WRITING.TEXT: That is amazing news! My cousin and I would love to hear what he thinks of this. Thank you!
I will try to upload a portfolio of his work tomorrow first thing, along with proof that he is the artist.

Sorry, I have to comply with Rule 1.
Hopefully this happens! My whole family has been incredibly supportive of him so I really do see him having a future in this line of work.
Honestly, i have no idea, ill ask him and see if he can answer it.
He actually told me he wishes to do that. Any ideas as to hot to get Morgan on bird with it?
yes, prismacolor colored pencils, I believe.
Oh we do! My entire extended family supports him fully.
